Identity and Access Management Platform for Developers

Get Started Features
Terminal

Last login: on console

The Okta Platform delivers all the power of Okta, for developers.
With the Okta REST API developers can build secure, scalable, and
robust identity and access management into any application that can
send an HTTP request.

Manage your users and groups

Avoid the hassle of deploying your own LDAP solution. Okta provides a robust cloud directory and supports the full user lifecycle.

Learn more

Create a rich user profile from multiple data sources

Centralize user attributes from any source or directory into one view of the user. Okta also keeps multiple user profile sources in sync.

Learn more

Secure access to your application

Securely authenticate users and manage their sessions. For extra security, use Okta’s multifactor authentication options.

Learn more

Enable single sign-on to all your applications

Leverage thousands of app integrations to implement single sign-on for your users. Integrate your own apps in minutes.

Learn more

Integrate with your partners’ directories

Connect your partners’ AD or LDAP user stores to Okta. Okta can create one consolidated directory for your app.

Learn more

Integrate with external identity providers

Easily enable authentication and authorization against external identity providers through standard federation protocols and social IDs.

Learn more
